legal.title: Legal bases
legal.body: We process data based on consent, performance of a contract (e.g. fulfilment of membership or orders), and legitimate interests such as service security and student representation.

retention.title: Storage and retention
retention.body: Data is stored securely and retained only as long as necessary for the stated purpose or as required by law (e.g. accounting rules).
